channel.title: We need more activity on Spearmint
channel.description: I've been wondering if Zack's still going to continue development of Spearmint. I haven't seen any development news since July. Is 0.5 still going as planned?

item.title: We need more activity on Spearmint
item.dc:creator: @zturtleman ZTM
item.description:
@zturtleman wrote:

I haven’t worked on Spearmint since version 0.4 was released. I’m kind of burned out and tired of working on it. There are other things I want to do and I should focus on life a little more. I’m taking a break from Spearmint for now.

Read full topic
item.source: We need more activity on Spearmint
